data.title: Market to Mid Pop FLASH/DRIVE
data.description: Contest Mid with this powerful pop flash, it will blind Attackers looking to take control. Coordinate a peek with your teammates at Cat, they'll be able to pop out of the smoke to fight.

data.title: A Main to A Lobby ZERO/POINT
data.description: A good ZERO/POINT to use early for A Main.

data.title: Mid Cubby to Mid Link ZERO/POINT
data.description: A good early round ZERO/POINT to get info on enemies near Mid Link.

data.title: Mid Market to B Main ZERO/POINT
data.description: A good ZERO/POINT to stop a rush or get info of players entering B Main.

data.title: Defender Spawn to B Site FRAG/MENT
data.description: This is a good FRAG/MENT for B Site from Defender Spawn to stop a plant or kill a planter if they continue to stick it.

data.title: B Lane to B Main FRAG/MENT
data.description: This is a good FRAG/MENT to disable a Killjoy Ultimate in B Main and prevent a push.

data.title: A Garden to A Cat Walk ZERO/POINT
data.description: This is a good ZERO/POINT for A Cat Walk from A Garden.
